si.title: නිදහස් පක්ෂ මූලස්ථානයට ශක්තිමත් ආරක්ෂාව
body_lines: පක්ෂයේ මහ ලේකම් ලෙස නැවත වැඩ ආරම්භ කරන බව දයාසිරි ජයසේකර ප්රකාශ කර තිබේ.

en.title: Strong Protection to Freedom Party Headquarters
body_lines: Dayasiri Jayasekara has announced that he will start work again as the party's general secretary.

summary_lines: Dayasiri Jayasekara resumes his role as the general secretary of the Strong Protection to Freedom Party, signaling a return to active leadership after a hiatus.
